name: Uploading Fliki videos to YouTube
description:
This Make.com scenario automates the end-to-end process of uploading Fliki-generated videos to YouTube. When a video render is completed in Fliki, the scenario triggers automatically. It then uses Google Gemini AI to generate a compelling, SEO-friendly video title based on the content. After that, it downloads the MP4 video file via an HTTP module, converting the URL into a binary buffer format suitable for YouTube. Finally, the video is uploaded directly to your YouTube channel, complete with the AI-generated title.

This setup is ideal for content creators, marketers, educators, and businesses looking to scale content publishing without manual uploading. Save time, maintain consistency, and streamline your content workflow by integrating text-to-video AI tools with your YouTube channel.

Set it once, and let your videos go live as soon as theyâ€™re ready.
